title: Gorgeous Lohi Modern 1 Bed! Luxury Living 5 min Downtown Denver!
neighborhood: Lohi * Lodo * Highlands * Union Station * Jefferson Park
posting_body: Call or Text Patrick to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings
Who says life in a trendsetting neighborhood can’t be tranquil?
Action-packed outside, soothing on the inside, this modern community encourages you to immerse yourself in leisure and luxury – right in the heart of Denver’s hot Lower Highlands neighborhood.
* 8’ stained wood entry doors with keyless entry
* Oversized windows with upgraded acoustics
* Custom 42” cabinets with soft close doors and under cabinet lighting
* Quartz counters with porcelain tile backsplashes
* French-door refrigerators
* Fixed or moveable kitchen islands*
* Dry bar with bottle storage*
* Roller shades
9- and 16-foot ceilings
* Luxury vinyl tile flooring
* Honeywell® learning thermostats
* Showers with built-in quartz benches and frameless glass doors or oversized tubs*
* Tile bathroom floors with floor-to-ceiling tile shower and tub surrounds
* Floating bathroom vanities
* Full-size front loading washers and dryers
* Pantry and linen closets*
Call or Text Patrick to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings
*Restrictions Apply.
Pricing, availability and lease terms subject to change anytime!
